question.para: Can I load studies with different chip types?

answer.para: You cannot load studies with different chip types if all your study data is in a single input file (this is logical as rows are named for probe set ids specific to individual chips). You can configure a study with different chip types (on a per sample basis) via the GUI and array center staff can load such a study. It may be possible to bulk load studies with different chip types using the data directory option, although this functionality has not been tested.
